package step4;

//注意文件名，这里应该写MyThread类
/***begin your code here***/
	public class MyThread extends Thread {
   int num;
	
	
	public MyThread(int num) {
		
		this.num=num;
		
	}
	
  
    public void run() {    	
    	
     int result = 1;
        int i=1;
    	
        for(i=1;i<=num;i++)
        {
            result=result*i;
        }
        
         try {  
                        Thread.sleep(1000);  
                    } catch (InterruptedException e) {  
                        // TODO Auto-generated catch block  
                        e.printStackTrace();  
                    }  
		
	
    	System.out.println(result);
    }
}


/***end your code***/
